description: Mycelia and Foods Limited is an innovative initiative in Kenya focused on mushroom cultivation. Established in 2021, it began with a self-help group of ten farmers and has since expanded to over 250 members. The project addresses malnutrition by providing a nutritious protein source while creating income opportunities for farmers. Mycelia specializes in oyster mushrooms, offering training, ready-made growing bags, and value-added products like dried mushrooms and cookies, aiming for sustainability and market expansion.
name: Mycelia and Foods Limited
